page.title: 13RECREATION RIVER NAIRN
page.content:
{THE B.M.X.TRACK A{B.M.X.}is a bike which has 20inch wheels You can use it as a race bike or as a freestyle bike If you are going to use it as a race bike the idea is to make the bike as light as possible You can do this by{taking the {reflectors off and the front brake off The freestyle{B.M.X}is different it has to have a{front brake}to do front wheel tricks The Nairn B.M.X track was built on a spot of ground that wasnt used much at the riverside The track is three metres wide and has hill areas built into it to do straight jumps It also has a feature called a quarter pipe which is built on a metal structure and allows arial acrobatics by the cyclist.
{ }
